original_title: 50 Years of Surfing on Film: Bruce Brown, Greg MacGillivray & George Greenough
overview: Chronicling the history of surf culture via the movies and videos that have celebrated it, this second volume in a four-part, half-century retrospective of the sport includes interviews with key filmmakers Bruce Brown, Greg MacGillivray and George Greenough. Blowing apart the idealized Hollywood myth, the films explored in this presentation have revealed to the world the true spirit of surfing.
title: 50 Years of Surfing on Film: Bruce Brown, Greg MacGillivray & George Greenough
